songs.title: I Never Try That Hard
songs.lyrics:
I'm not that cruel, I'm not that kind

There's really nothing on my mind

Believe me

And when I'm talking in my sleep

It doesn't ever get that deep

There's not much to me

I never try that hard, so everything is easy

And if I hold on tight, I only get dizzy

And if I'm left alone, I can always please me

I add up all the good I've done

Then count the bad things one by one

And it evens out

And if I've had the odd regret

It's nothing that I can't forget

To think about

I never try that hard, so everything is easy

And if I hold on tight, I only get dizzy

And if I'm left alone, I can always please me

I know that we won't last for long

That someone else will come along

And play his hand

And when we're layin' in our bed

And you're wishin' he were here instead

I'll understand

I never try that hard, so everything is easy

And if I hold on tight, I only get dizzy

And if I'm left alone, I can always please me
